description:
A video has gone viral after a “possessed” American Airlines passenger had a violent meltdown, with one witness claiming this “was probably the most disturbing thing” they had ever seen in their entire life.

Not even minutes after the plane took off in Savannah, Ga., the man ended up in handcuffs but not before he caused injuries and vandalized airline property.

#AmericanAirlines flight returns after attack on passengers who claimed to be fleeing "demons". The man beat the crew, swallowed a rosary as a "spiritual weapon" and claimed to be escaping religious attacks on his way to #Haiti.
title: Man attempts to flee "demons" on an airplane, swallows rosary beads in order to defeat them once and for all

description:
United Nations Judge Lydia Mugambe was convicted by a British jury for forcing a woman into domestic servitude. And of course, she was also listed as a fellow in Columbia University’s human rights program.

United Nations judge Lydia Mugambe has been found guilty of keeping a SLAVE and breaking immigration laws.
I'd love to say I'm shocked, but I'm just not.#unitednations #justice #Patriot pic.twitter.com/WwmRikkB6v
— Steve Wild (@SteveWildNHPUK)
title: A United Nations judge was convicted of owning a slave. Yes, in 2025.

description:
So it turns out the side that claims to be compassionate also includes people making death threats to people solely because they disagree with them politically. And to call that deranged and bigoted does not even begin to describe it.

Sen. Thom Tillis has released audio of death threats his office has received and it’s worse than you think.

NEW: North Carolina Sen. Thom Tillis (R) releases audio of death thre*ts directed at him, his staff and his family

"Southern White f*** trash... inferior f***, low f***, bad genes, inbred, stupid c***"

A woman warned Sen. Thom Tillis to be "very careful about going out i
title: GOP Senator releases audio of the vicious threats against him AND his family by unhinge progressives
